steps.title: Pronounce the “Saoir” portion of the name as “Seer,” which rhymes with “clear.”
steps.content: Pronounce the “Saoir” portion of the name as “Seer,” which rhymes with “clear.” This is the most appropriate and common way to pronounce the first syllable of “Saoirse.” [2] X Research source Despite the traditional pronunciation of “Saoirse,” some parents and individuals may pronounce “Saoir” as “Sair,” which rhymes with “air.”

steps.title: Pronounce the “se” portion of the name as “sha,” which rhymes with “huh.”
steps.content: Pronounce the “se” portion of the name as “sha,” which rhymes with “huh.” [3] X Research source

steps.title: Combine both portions and syllables of the name to pronounce “Saoirse” as “Seer-sha.”
steps.content: Combine both portions and syllables of the name to pronounce “Saoirse” as “Seer-sha.” [4] X Research source
